interface.name: kudzu_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute kudzu in the kudzu domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: kudzu_run
interface.summary: Execute kudzu in the kudzu domain, and allow the specified role the kudzu domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the kudzu domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the kudzu domain to use.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
